Observe drainage situation.sentence: The nurse inspects the drainage site for any signs of infection.
Observe drainage situation.subject: The nurse

Observe drainage situation.sentence: The nurse measures the amount of drainage collected in the container.
Observe drainage situation.subject: The nurse

Observe drainage situation.sentence: The nurse assesses the color and consistency of the drainage fluid.
Observe drainage situation.subject: The nurse
Observe drainage situation.object: the color and consistency of the drainage fluid

Observe drainage situation.sentence: The nurse documents the findings in the patient's medical record.
Observe drainage situation.subject: The nurse

Observe drainage situation.sentence: The nurse reports any abnormal findings to the attending physician.
Observe drainage situation.subject: The nurse
